sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <template>
      <v-card tile>
        <v-container>
          <v-form>
            <v-row>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-card max-width="300px">
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="6">
                      <v-icon class="pl-2" size="70" color="blue darken-2"
                        >store</v-icon
                      >
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="6" class="display-3 font-weight-bold">
                      90
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                  <v-divider></v-divider>
                  <v-card-subtitle class="text-center"
                    >Total Product</v-card-subtitle
                  >
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-card max-width="300px">
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="6">
                      <v-icon class="pl-2" size="70" color="green darken-2"
                        >shopping_cart</v-icon
                      >
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="6" class="display-3 font-weight-bold">
                      80
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                  <v-divider></v-divider>
                  <v-card-subtitle class="text-center"
                    >Total Order</v-card-subtitle
                  >
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-card max-width="300px">
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="6">
                      <v-icon class="pl-2" size="70" color="blue darken-2"
                        >mdi-account</v-icon
                      >
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="6" class="display-3 font-weight-bold">
                      70
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                  <v-divider></v-divider>
                  <v-card-subtitle class="text-center"
                    >Total Customer</v-card-subtitle
                  >
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="3">
                <v-card max-width="300px">
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="6">
                      <v-icon class="pl-2" size="70" color="purple darken-2"
                        >mdi-account-multiple</v-icon
                      >
                    </v-col>
                    <v-col cols="6" class="display-3 font-weight-bold">
                      60
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                  <v-divider></v-divider>
                  <v-card-subtitle class="text-center"
                    >Total Supplier</v-card-subtitle
                  >
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="12">
                <v-card>
                  <v-container fluid>
                    <v-row>
                      <v-col cols="9">
                        <v-card-title>Income Chart</v-card-title>
                      </v-col>
                      <v-col cols="3">
                        <v-select
                          v-model="selectIncome"
                          :items="selectValue"
                          item-text="textDate"
                          item-value="valueDate"
                          @change="changeDate"
                        >
                        </v-select>
                      </v-col>
                      <v-col cols="12">
                        <line-chart
                          :data="dummyData"
                          xtitle="Date"
                          ytitle="Income"
                          :xmin="dateStart"
                          :xmax="dateEnd"
                        ></line-chart>
                      </v-col>
                    </v-row>
                  </v-container>
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
              <v-col cols="12">
                <v-card>
                  <v-container fluid>
                    <v-row align="center">
                      <v-col cols="9">
                        <v-card-title>Outcome Chart</v-card-title>
                      </v-col>
                      <v-col cols="3">
                        <v-select
                          v-model="selectOutcome"
                          :items="selectValue"
                          item-text="textDate"
                          item-value="valueDate"
                        >
                        </v-select>
                      </v-col>
                      <v-col cols="12">
                        <line-chart
                          :data="dataDummy"
                          xtitle="Date"
                          ytitle="Outcome"
                        ></line-chart>
                      </v-col>
                    </v-row>
                  </v-container>
                </v-card>
              </v-col>
            </v-row>
          </v-form>
        </v-container>
      </v-card>
    </template>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      dummyData: [
        ["26-Nov-2020", 4],
        ["27-Nov-2020", 5],
        ["28-Nov-2020", 7],
        ["29-Nov-2020", 8],
        ["30-Nov-2020", 3],
        ["01-Dec-2020", 4],
        ["02-Dec-2020", 9],
        ["03-Dec-2020", 10],
        ["04-Dec-2020", 3],
        ["05-Dec-2020", 2],
        ["06-Dec-2020", 1],
        ["07-Dec-2020", 0],
        ["08-Dec-2020", 5],
        ["09-Dec-2020", 4],
        ["10-Dec-2020", 3],
        ["11-Dec-2020", 2],
        ["12-Dec-2020", 6],
        ["13-Dec-2020", 7],
        ["14-Dec-2020", 6],
        ["15-Dec-2020", 5],
        ["16-Dec-2020", 6],
        ["17-Dec-2020", 9],
        ["18-Dec-2020", 7],
        ["19-Dec-2020", 6],
        ["20-Dec-2020", 7],
        ["21-Dec-2020", 4],
        ["22-Dec-2020", 3],
        ["23-Dec-2020", 5],
        ["24-Dec-2020", 9],
        ["25-Dec-2020", 10],
        ["26-Dec-2020", 9],
        ["27-Dec-2020", 1],
        ["28-Dec-2020", 0],
        ["29-Dec-2020", 8],
        ["30-Dec-2020", 4],
        ["31-Dec-2020", 5],
        ["01-Jan-2021", 3],
        ["02-Jan-2021", 4],
        ["03-Jan-2021", 5],
        ["04-Jan-2021", 6],
      ],
      selectIncome: "",
      selectOutcome: "",
      dateStart: "",
      dateEnd: new Date(),
      dataDummy: [
        ["2017-01-01 00:00:00 UTC", 7],
        [new Date(), 5],
      ],
      selectValue: [
        { textDate: "Last 7 Days", valueDate: 7 },
        { textDate: "Last 1 Month", valueDate: 30 },
        { textDate: "Last 1 Years", valueDate: 365 },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    changeDate() {
      this.dateChange();
    },

    dateChange() {
      var date = new Date();
      date.setDate(date.getDate() - this.selectIncome);

      this.dateStart = date;
      console.log(this.dateStart);
    },
  },
};
</script>
